meanings.definition: The quality or state of being concentric.
meanings.sent1: The concentricities of the circles made the pattern beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully painted the concentricities of the circles.
meanings.sent3: The concentricities of the circles seemed to dance on the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved in concentricities, always circling back to the same idea.
meanings.sent5: The concentricities of the circles created a mesmerizing effect.

meanings.definition: The condition of having concentric circles or spheres.
meanings.sent1: The target had multiple concentricities for archers to aim at.
meanings.sent2: The tree rings showed clear concentricities, indicating its age.
meanings.sent3: The cake's layers had concentricities that delighted the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The planets' orbits displayed concentricities in their movements.
meanings.sent5: The concentricities of the spheres were perfectly aligned.
